iana.security_considerations:
This format contains no executable code. The format uses Zip compression 
and UTF-8 encoded XML, and contains image files in PNG and TGA formats, 
and as such inherits the security considerations of those formats. No 
cryptographic integrity or confidentiality protections are required or 
supported.

(registered 2017-05-30, last updated 2017-05-30)

Media type name: application
Media subtype name: vnd.evolv.ecig.theme

Required parameters: None.

Encoding considerations: binary

Security considerations:
This format contains no executable code. The format uses Zip compression 
and UTF-8 encoded XML, and contains image files in PNG and TGA formats, 
and as such inherits the security considerations of those formats. No 
cryptographic integrity or confidentiality protections are required or 
supported.

Interoperability considerations:
None.

None.
